title: 我的minecraftbukkit-1.1-r4怎么弄
author: 神马赤兔
txt_content:
下好之后该怎么办
教程看不懂啊

replies.author: ayaya
replies.txt_content:
...看不懂就没有开服的潜力开个start.bat贴上：
JAVA6:
@ECHO OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar craftbukkit.jar
PAUSE
java7:
@ECHO OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar craftbukkit.jar
PAUSE
